elements.name: Add valid current job details for an employee

steps.name: the user navigates to the Job section and clicks
the user clicks on Edit button to update current job details
the Admin user selects "Software Engineer" from Job Title dropdown
the Admin user selects "remote" from Employment Status dropdown
the Admin user selects "IT" from Job Category dropdown
the Admin user selects "2022-01-15" from Joined Date calendar
the Admin user selects "Team Leaders" from Sub Unit dropdown
the Admin user selects "Chicago" from Location dropdown
the Admin user selects "2022-01-20" from Start Date calendar
the Admin user leaves End Date calendar empty
the Admin user uploads a valid contract file "EMP_CONTRACT_FILE_PATH"
the user clicks the save button
the Current job details should be updated successfully
the changes should be reflected in the database

name: Add or Update Current Job Details for Employees

  I want to be able to add and update current job details for employees,
  So that employee records are complete and reflect accurate job information.
